document_data.caption: A map showing the Tower of Osiris (labeled #21) in the City of the Gods.
document_data.name: Tower of Osiris
document_data.location: [[Skuld/City of the Gods|City of the Gods]], [[Skuld]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tower of Osiris''' was a sacred tower located in the capital city of [[Skuld]] in [[Mulhorand]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|490 Skuld}}
document_data.Location: The Tower was located in the northwest corner of the [[Skuld/City of the Gods|City of the Gods]] in the northern central part of the city.
document_data.History: The Tower of Osiris was thousands of years old as of the {{YearlinkName|1357}}. It served as a home for the [[incarnation]] of [[Osiris]], the [[Mulhorandi pantheon|Mulhorandi]] [[god]] of the dead.
